#summary How to use dbassert library
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

= Instructions =
Download the library from [http://code.google.com/p/dbassert/downloads/list downloads page].
Put it under your classpath.

==The dependencies are:==


  * [http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=23316 HSQLDB] - if you want to use _fake_ sources, like dbAssert.fake_source("my_fake_source");
in this case in-memory database instance will be created.
  * [https://sourceforge.net/projects/jyaml JYaml] - JYaml is a Java library for working with the Yaml file format.
All database settings and fixtures use that format.
